fucking hate this god forsaken game

Awesome game would recommend it to anyone who asks about it. Compeditive is a bit negative you cant see your own elo which is teriible and no one knows how the elo works which is also very bad not only that but you cant quee up with people that are a certain amout of ranks higher or lower than you which i agree with but unfortunately even though you cant quee with them the game throws those ranks in your lobby which doesnt make sense you could be ranked very high and recieve someone very low in your team by random and could cause u a derank or you could be low and play against high ranks which could restrain u from ranking up. Sad life
High skill ceiling, having fun reaching it.
Best game ever thank you Gaben
Ta gra to gówno w której liczy sie tylko szczęscie
I would say this is on of the best games on steam for sure

这个游戏，怎么说呢。说实话对新手很不友好！上去可能各种被虐！
给新手几个建议：（划重点）
      1.新手最好远离步枪，最好搞吧顺手的冲锋枪。近距离众生平等。
      2.不要去开箱子，保证赔钱。你绝对不是欧皇。想要皮肤，直接市场买。
      3.新手打竞技，要努力报点发枪。不然会被喷
      4.R8一响，爹妈白养。（渐变R8欢迎入手）
      5.没事看看茄子，学习下白给怎么调整心态~
Most of the players are pure shiet but in overall the game is worth it when playing competitive. There are a lot of tactics.
In compagnia di amici o un team può rivelarsi divertente

That's an old game, but still good. But the experience becomes worse everyday, with bad nerfs and buffs, the anti-cheat being very slow, the "trust launch mode" that makes impossible the usage of Nvidia Filters for exemple, and having to restart the game after each non-official server entrance (community servers, or local server to play vs. bots etc). The matchmaking system and ranking system are mysteries and bad too, you queue with silent or loud russians most of the time, sometimes they grief and throw the match for no reason. Then the trust factor is something too, i'm a normal player, not toxic not griefing, just a normal player and I have a bad trust factor god knows why. So now I queue with griefers and cheaters even more than usual. Thank you Valve for this game, that is truly good but you have been destroying it for years.
Fun game, just need to upgrade hacker prevention system
